attributes.action: Use the British Military alongside allied countries - NATO to intervene and remove Mugabe from Power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the Military to prevent a possible genocide and thus remove Mugabe from power once and for all.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=mugabe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=memorial&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
